```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```


```{r make-plot}

storms %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(wind = mean(wind)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = year, y = wind)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_point()


```
